cells.data: -- doesDirectoryExist :: FilePath -> IO Boolon doesDirectoryExist(strPath)    set ca to current application    set oPath to (ca's NSString's stringWithString:strPath)'s ¬        stringByStandardizingPath    set {bln, v} to (ca's NSFileManager's defaultManager's ¬        fileExistsAtPath:oPath isDirectory:(reference))    bln and vend doesDirectoryExist
